Game tested and working fine in w7 64bit
Note:
1) at the end of installation press "accept"
2) if u install in diferent disc than c: then have the folder name in English or else GFWL will not work
3) for auto save: in GFWL....press "create new profile".. pull down the document and u will see "create local profile"..select a name... press 'done"
4) if the next time u open the game GFWL wants to sign etc etc.. just press X and close it... the game will continue
5) ENJOY (NO NEED FOR OTHER CRACK THAN SKIDROW)

Here's how it worked for me

1) Download the game (SKIDROW)
2) Download the crack (FightClub)
3) Install the game 
4) Copy and paste the [Binaries] folder inside [FightCLub] folder to your game installation folder
5) Go to your game installation folder, use the BmLauncher to start your game, should be at WB Games Batman Arkham City GOTY Binaries Win32 BmLauncher
6) Game starts
7) Create local profile, and you are good to go (Go search youtube for tutorial "How to create local profile" )
8) SEED

I found myself figuring out what piece of '.exe' or other downloadable programs to start off with.

First- I extracted all of the torrent from iso into my own folder I made in my documents (batman)

Second- I didn't have (WINDOWS LIVE) so i downloaded 'gfwlivesetup'

Third- I downloaded 'Setup' (NOT Game, or AMD_DCOptSetup)
(The code '11111-11111-11111-11111-11111' works only in this 'setup.' Three windows appear while downloading of the game, do not cancel any of them) It will ask for online check, DO IT

YOU SHOULD THEN HAVE in your PROGRAMS (WB GAME)

I used a CRACK that has 46 ITEMS in the binaries folder, COPIED that into the PROGRAMS BINARIES

CRACK won't work unless SKIDROW's 'budda.dll' is also added to the mix. 

(One note for all, make sure that all of the BINARIES items are ALL REPLACED by a CRACKED version AND SKIDROW)

BMLauncher, BatmanAC.exe and buddha.dll are all still in the folder. But cannot launch the game without the authentication coming up, which was not a problem the first time i successfully ran the game. pity really.

to those who still have problems:

~Download GFWL first or update your GFWL!
then:
1) mount iso (i used daemon tools)
2) click "Setup" (the one with blue icon sky)
3) the authentication should pop up then enter:
     11111-11111-11111-11111-11111
4) let it install. multiple windows will appear and disappear (not a problem just let it do its thing!)
5) once finished, copy and paste or drag and drop everything from SKIDROW folder to your installation folder/binaries/Win32
6) exempt the installation folder as well the files: BatmanAC.exe and buddha.dll
7) play the game!
8) if authentication appears after a few hours or days of playing means you messed up something in the step by step process.
